languages.text: "О, только в нас и сохранилась самая их эссенция, провидец. Вы сами отказались от великого наследия в угоду своей трусости — не срывайся на мне в своих жалких попытках оправдать подобное предательство".

traits.locale_text: "О, только в нас и сохранилась самая их эссенция, провидец. Вы сами отказались от великого наследия в угоду своей трусости — не срывайся на мне в своих жалких попытках оправдать подобное предательство".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Oh, but we are all that keeps their very essence alive, Farseer. You chose to abandon their great legacy at the call of cowardice, so do not embarrass yourself now with your pathetic attempts to justify such a betrayal."
languages.original_text: "О, только в нас и сохранилась самая их эссенция, провидец. Вы сами отказались от великого наследия в угоду своей трусости — не срывайся на мне в своих жалких попытках оправдать подобное предательство".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, but we are all that keeps their very essence alive, Farseer, while you abandoned their great legacy at the call of cowardice. So do not take your chagrin out on me in your pathetic attempts to justify such a betrayal."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, but we are all that keeps their very essence alive, Farseer, while you abandoned their great legacy at the call of cowardice. So do not take your chagrin out on me in your pathetic attempts to justify such a betrayal."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, but we are all that keeps their very essence alive, Farseer. You chose to abandon their great legacy at the call of cowardice, so now don't embarrass yourself with your pathetic attempts to justify such a betrayal."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, but we are all that keeps their very essence alive, Farseer. You chose to abandon their great legacy at the call of cowardice, so now don't embarrass yourself with your pathetic attempts to justify such a betrayal."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, but we are all that keeps their very essence alive, Farseer. You chose to abandon their great legacy at the call of cowardice, so do not embarrass yourself now with your pathetic attempts to justify such a betrayal."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, but we are all that keeps their very essence alive, Farseer. You chose to abandon their great legacy at the call of cowardice, so do not embarrass yourself now with your pathetic attempts to justify such a betrayal."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “是嘛，可我们才是祖先真正的子嗣，先知。你们踏上了懦夫的道路，抛弃了祖先伟大的遗产。所以，别再用你那些可悲的借口来开脱你的背叛行为。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, but we are all that keeps their very essence alive, Farseer. You chose to abandon their great legacy at the call of cowardice, so do not embarrass yourself now with your pathetic attempts to justify such a betrayal."

traits.locale_text: “是嘛，可我们才是祖先真正的子嗣，先知。你们踏上了懦夫的道路，抛弃了祖先伟大的遗产。所以，别再用你那些可悲的借口来开脱你的背叛行为。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「だが先見司、彼らの本質を生かしているのは俺たちだけだ。お前は臆病者の呼びかけに応じて奴らの偉大な遺産を放棄した。だから今は、自分の裏切りを正当化して、恥をかかないことだな」
languages.original_text: "Oh, but we are all that keeps their very essence alive, Farseer. You chose to abandon their great legacy at the call of cowardice, so do not embarrass yourself now with your pathetic attempts to justify such a betrayal."

traits.locale_text: 「だが先見司、彼らの本質を生かしているのは俺たちだけだ。お前は臆病者の呼びかけに応じて奴らの偉大な遺産を放棄した。だから今は、自分の裏切りを正当化して、恥をかかないことだな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Pues somos la quintaesencia de lo que fuimos, vidente. Elegisteis abandonar su grandioso legado por pura cobardía, así que no te pongas en evidencia intentando justificar semejante traición».
languages.original_text: "Oh, but we are all that keeps their very essence alive, Farseer. You chose to abandon their great legacy at the call of cowardice, so do not embarrass yourself now with your pathetic attempts to justify such a betrayal."

traits.locale_text: «Pues somos la quintaesencia de lo que fuimos, vidente. Elegisteis abandonar su grandioso legado por pura cobardía, así que no te pongas en evidencia intentando justificar semejante traición».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Oh, aber wir sind alles, was ihre Essenz am Leben hält, Runenprophet. Ihr habt entschieden, ein großes Vermächtnis aus Feigheit aufzugeben. Beschämt Euch nun also nicht selbst durch Eure erbärmlichen Versuche, diesen Verrat zu rechtfertigen."
languages.original_text: "Oh, but we are all that keeps their very essence alive, Farseer. You chose to abandon their great legacy at the call of cowardice, so do not embarrass yourself now with your pathetic attempts to justify such a betrayal."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, aber wir sind alles, was ihre Essenz am Leben hält, Runenprophet. Ihr habt entschieden, ein großes Vermächtnis aus Feigheit aufzugeben. Beschämt Euch nun also nicht selbst durch Eure erbärmlichen Versuche, diesen Verrat zu rechtfertigen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Oh, mais c'est uniquement grâce à nous que leur essence n'a pas entièrement disparu, Grand Prophète. Vous avez choisi de répondre à l'appel de la couardise et d'abandonner leur héritage, alors n'essayez même pas de justifier une telle trahison. Vous ne feriez que vous humilier davantage. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, but we are all that keeps their very essence alive, Farseer. You chose to abandon their great legacy at the call of cowardice, so do not embarrass yourself now with your pathetic attempts to justify such a betrayal."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, mais c'est uniquement grâce à nous que leur essence n'a pas entièrement disparu, Grand Prophète. Vous avez choisi de répondre à l'appel de la couardise et d'abandonner leur héritage, alors n'essayez même pas de justifier une telle trahison. Vous ne feriez que vous humilier davantage. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Onların özünü bizden başka yaşatan mı kaldı Ötesezen? Siz korkaklığı, atalarınızın mirasını bırakmayı seçtiniz. Şimdi böyle bir ihaneti aklamaya çalışıp da kendini küçük düşürme."
languages.original_text: "Oh, but we are all that keeps their very essence alive, Farseer. You chose to abandon their great legacy at the call of cowardice, so do not embarrass yourself now with your pathetic attempts to justify such a betrayal."

traits.locale_text: "Ama onların özünü bizden başka yaşatan mı kaldı Ötesezen? Siz korkaklığı, atalarınızın mirasını bırakmayı seçtiniz. Şimdi böyle bir ihaneti aklamaya çalışıp da kendini küçük düşürme lütfen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
